Simple Cookie functions

The following are simple js functions for setting, getting and checking cookies.

Set Cookie

Sets a cookie.

|Argument|Description| |--------|-----------| |cname|The name of the cookie| |cvalue|The value of the cookie| |exdays|How long until the cookie expires in days|

Check Cookie

Checks the existence of a cookie with a simple boolean return.

|Argument|Description| |--------|-----------| |cname|The name of the cookie to check|

Get Cookie

Retrieves a cookie.

|Argument|Description| |--------|-----------| |cname|The name of the cookie to retrieve|
